org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:title: Min Distance
org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:summary: Report GPS distance every so many meters - the larger, the more accurate

org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:title: Graph Smoothing
org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:summary: shows a more visually appealing smooth stroke curve in power graph

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Straight Line
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: For split measures on a straight course, this can improve split distance accuracy

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Reset on Start
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Reset split timer, distance, speed values to zero when split timer starts start

org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:title: Detection Sensitivity
org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:summary: Determines minimum stroke power required to activate the rowing detector - higher means less sensitive

org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:title: Rowing Timeout
org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:summary: Stop rowing timers after these many seconds of no further strokes events

org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:title: Restart Wait Time
org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:summary: Period of 'cool down' time in seconds to disable rowing restart

EditTextPreference.android:title: Remote Host
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Remote device to receive real-time session data from
Port on which to boradcast/receive session data

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Recording start mark
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Display a 'film leader' countdown dialog to assist synchronizing session recording with external audio/video media

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Coax mode
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: For example When device is used by a forward facing coax

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Reset settings
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If selected, you will be given the option to reset your settings next time you start the application

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Create Log
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If selected, next time you start Talos Rowing, a log file 'talos-main.log' will be created at the root of your SD card which can be sent to the developer for debugging purposes

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Advanced Settings
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Don't touch these unless you know what you are doing!

org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:title: Orientation Filter
org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:summary: Device orientation up/down stabalizing factor - the smaller, the more stable

ListPreference.android:title: Sensor Delay
ListPreference.android:summary: Time in millis between each sensor update - 0 means as fast as possible (requires restart)

org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:title: Smoothing Factor
org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:summary: Raw acceleration value lowpass filtering factor - removes 'noise' from rowing graph for ease of rate detection

org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:title: Min Amplitude
org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:summary: Minimum amplitude of acceleration/deceleration wave for acceptance/rejection by the stroke detector

org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:title: Amplitude Accept
org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:summary: Amplitude change accept factor - current stroke amplitude must be above this much or previous values to be valid

org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:title: Rate Change Accept
org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:summary: Filters out rowing events apearing too close to a previous one - e.g. to prevent a rowing event detected during recovery

org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:title: Amplitude Stabalizer
org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:summary: Amplitude change damper lowpass filter factor - reduces errors due to erratic power change

org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:title: Min Acceptable Power
org.nargila.robostroke.android.common.Se.android:summary: total power sum (as seen in power bar graph) must acceed this value for a valid stroke
